main.name: Mickey Kim
main.description: As a recent computer science graduate and previous computational biology cancer researcher, I'm looking to transition into a career in emergent technology (embedded IoT, Swift iOS, or full stack development) with emphasis on digital health
main.bio: I am a technology enthusiast with a passion for digital health. Previously, I worked in computational biology research focusing on personalized genomics for cancer treatment and have co-authored five papers (one first authorship). I also have extensive experience in education consulting to assist parents and students achieve their education goals through personalized expert assessment. Having recently completed a MSc in computer science, I want to transition careers in emerging technological fields such as embedded IoT, Swift iOS, or full stack development, particularly in the areas of digital health. I aspire to create technological solutions to human diseases, both physical and mental. In my free time I enjoy making music and traveling.
main.contactmessage: Drop me a line. (Contact form WIP, please send an email for now!)

Graduated Magna Cum Laude. Received Calhoun Honors College Award for completion of honors-level curriculum.
